snippet: Court Coursey, managing partner of the investment firm TomorrowVentures, once lost his passport aboard a plane. A scanned copy on his laptop helped get him released.
abstract: Frequent Flier column features TomorrowVentures managing partner Court Coursey discussing his flying experiences.
lead_paragraph: Court Coursey, managing partner of the investment firm TomorrowVentures, once lost his passport aboard a plane. A scanned copy on his laptop helped get him released.

headline.main: Never a Stressed Traveler Until His Passport Was Gone
headline.print_headline: Never a Stressed Traveler Until His Passport Was Gone
